translations: n.十四的记号；十四岁；十四点钟
adj.十四的；十四个的；十四岁的

sentences.sentence: "Fourteen minutes," Chris said, taking a peep at his watch.
sentences.translation: “十四分钟，”克里斯瞥了一眼手表说道。

sentences.sentence: Women are advised not to drink more than fourteen units of alcohol per week.
sentences.translation: 建议妇女每周饮酒不超过十四个酒精单位。
